    IMFData.get_ifs_data — Function.
    get_ifs_data(area::String, indicator::String, frequency::String, startyear::Int, endyear::Int)

    IMFData.get_imf_datasets — Function.
    get_imf_datasets()

    Return the list of datasets that are accessible from the IMF API, along with their dataset IDs, as a DataFrame.

    IMFData.get_imf_datastructure — Function.
    get_imf_datastructure(dataset_id::String)
